description: '''Takamba''' is a music and dance native to the [[Songhai people|Songhai]] and [[Tuareg people|Tuareg]] peoples of [[Niger]] and [[Mali]]. It is both a musical composition and a dance. The musicians play a traditional instrument known as the [[Ngoni (instrument)|Kurbu or Tehardent]] and a traditional African [[Calabash (percussion)|Calabash]]. The Takamba dance includes graceful and rhythmic movements performed both seated and standing where the shoulders and arms sway with the flow of the music.
